entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Question] Is there a way to properly emulate InvalidModelStateResponseFactory in minimal apis? #57337
  • Perf regression: endpoint #57335
  • Perf improvement: mvc #57334
  • Server URLs in OpenAPI document are incorrect when application used with .NET Aspire #57332
  • Issue adding static server-side rendering (SSR) pages to a globally interactive Blazor Web App #57329
  • Use case support for Blazor Web App in Interactive Auto mode #57327
  • Unexpected Syntax Error in blazor.web.js on iOS Versions Below 17 in .NET 9 Preview 7 #57326
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #57325

Closed

  • .NET Core 8+ Api failing intermittently (w/ Swagger) #53028
  • OpenAPI operations include parameters disallowed by OpenAPI 3.0 specification #57305
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Exception from dotnet build for project using JsonPolymorphic with TypeDiscriminatorPropertyName #56575
  • New Descripton Parameter for Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ProducesResponseTypeAttribute Class #17608
    Backlog
  • SDK 8.0.101 - Endpoint Filters and Output Caching - endpoint filters do not run prior to the cache hit #53460
  • Perf improvement: mvc #57270
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #57321
  • ProducesResponseType should support setting a Description #54064
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #57339
    area-infrastructure
  • Detect trimming issues in CI #57338
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor
  • Fix code generation for parsing optional array parameters in RequestDelegateGenerator #57336
    community-contribution, area-networking

Merged

  • Enable auto-merges for 9.0 rel branches #57333
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-rc1
  • Exclude some headers from OpenAPI parameters #57328
    area-mvc, community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-rc1
  • Remove LINQ usage for IEnumerable comparisons #57323
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-rc1
  • [release/2.1] Update Wix to 3.14.1 #57320
    area-infrastructure, 2.1.x

Updated

  • Update branding to 10.0 #57340
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Propagate PropertyInfo for AsParameters parameters #57264
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Perf improvement: Fix Cumulative Layout Shift issue in blank Blazor templates #57213
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Use System.Threading.Lock in Kestrel #57236
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Upgrade Benchmark.DotNet dependency #57297
    area-infrastructure
  • Upgrade xunit version to 2.9.0 #57303
    area-infrastructure
  • *DO NOT MERGE* Test install-script.sh #57207
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun
